projects.title: XChange
projects.description: A full-stack currency exchange app built with Next.js. authentication and role-based access, and secure admin features.

projects.title: Hotel ease
projects.description: A simple hotel booking website built with Next.js. browsing, viewing, and reserving rooms with detailed listings and image galleries.

projects.title: Blogify
projects.description: A full-stack blog sharing website built with React and Node.js, write blogs in a rich text editor with predefined tags and share them with other users.

projects.title: Inteo
projects.description: A full-stack currency exchange app built with Next.js and Node.js. Real-time conversion, role-based access, and secure admin features.

projects.title: Jewels
projects.description: A single page website built with React, a brand with collections of different type of jewelry.
